description:
batou is a service deployment utility inspired by tools like Puppet,
Fabric, and other modern tools. It made a short appearance in a
lightning talk and at the sprints during EP 2012.

The talk gives an overview and demonstrates with practical examples how
we deploy web applications with many complex components:

-  modelling service components with Python
-  multiple environments
-  multiple platforms
-  development environments
-  convergent behaviour
-  remote deployments
-  secrets management (database passwords, SSL certificates, …)
-  no additional run-time dependencies

I will show how the real-life requirements in our projects led us to
develop a general model that integrates existing practices without
building a huge stack of technologies.
title: batou - a multi-(component|environment|platform|.*) deployment tool
